Html:
Hello, thanks very much for the great wrapper.

But I find there is time format display issue exists on the latest TriggerEditDialog -- When I set Non-English Time format on 'Region and Language' of Control Panel, for example, set Format to 'Franch (France)', set Short time format to 'HH:mm' and Long time format to 'HH:mm:ss', then the StartBoundary on TriggerEditDialog will show 12h format instead of 24h format. That is unable to determine if AM or PM time.
I find this issue and root cause has ever been posted as below link:
https://taskscheduler.codeplex.com/discussions/441722

Is there any plan to fix this problem for the wrapper? Thanks.
Yes, please try the 2.5.22 release that was just pushed 2 days ago.
That works, thank you very much!
